parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the peripheral configuration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_UARTE_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_uarte_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified UARTE interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if interrupts associated with the event mask are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the UARTE interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified UARTE events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().
Pointer to the structure containing buffer associated with the last reception. Can be NULL.

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

briefdescription.para: Function for aborting the ongoing UARTE transmission.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if CPU should wait for peripheral to abort transmission, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for stopping the UARTE transmitter and receiver.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing reception buffer. Can be NULL.

briefdescription.para: Function for starting the UARTE transmission.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True for blocking transmission, false otherwise.

simplesect.para: Mask of events occured, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK(). Always 0 for non-blocking transmission.

briefdescription.para: Function for starting the UARTE reception.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing reception buffer if the reception is to be blocking. NULL for non-blocking reception.

simplesect.para: Mask of events occured, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK(). Always 0 for non-blocking reception.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting UARTE pins configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the UARTE pin configurartion structure.
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_event_clear Function for clearing a specific UARTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to clear.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_event_check Function for retrieving the state of the UARTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_event_address_get Function for returning the address of the specified UARTE event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The specified event.

simplesect.para: Address of specified event register.
nrf_uarte_shorts_set Function for configuring UARTE shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be set.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_shorts_get Function for getting UARTE shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be checked.

simplesect.para: Mask of requested shortcuts which were enabled.
nrf_uarte_shorts_enable Function for enabling UARTE shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be enabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_shorts_disable Function for disabling UARTE shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be disabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_int_enable Function for enabling UARTE interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_uarte_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_uarte_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_uarte_int_disable Function for disabling the specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_uarte_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_subscribe_set Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given UARTE task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_subscribe_clear Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given UARTE task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_publish_set Function for setting the publish configuration for a given UARTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_publish_clear Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given UARTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_errorsrc_get_and_clear Function for getting error source mask. Function is clearing error source flags after reading.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Mask with error source flags.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_enable_check Function for checking if the UARTE is enabled.

The UARTE is not enabled.

RXD pin number.

RTS pin number.
CTS pin number.

Task.

Task.

nrf_uarte_configure Function for configuring UARTE.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to UARTE settings structure.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_baudrate_set Function for setting UARTE baud rate.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Baud rate.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_tx_buffer_set Function for setting the transmit buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the buffer with data to send.
Maximum number of data bytes to transmit.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_tx_buffer_get Function for getting the transmit buffer address.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the transmit buffer.
nrf_uarte_tx_amount_get Function for getting number of bytes transmitted in the last transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
of bytes transmitted.

simplesect.para: nrf_uarte_rx_buffer_set Function for setting the receive buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the buffer for received data.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
of bytes received.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer with cache and barrier support for managing the UARTE peripheral.
